short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically Display the App Exclusive Content of pia.jp

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PiaSuke removes the blocker of pia.jp that prevents users from reading some content in web browser, which is actually also free to read with Pia's mobile application. Click the extension button, it will fetching the content for you in the background, no user account or authentication is required.
